message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $15,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $12,000 is below what I was hoping for, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate it, but I still cannot exceed $12,000 for the product. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between?
